UMP Rp4,2 Juta, DKI Subsidi Pangan hingga Transportasi
02 Nov 2019, 10:13 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan telah mengetuk upah minium pendapatan (UMP) DKI 2020 menjadi Rp4,2 juta. Di samping itu, Kepala Dinas Ketenagakerjaan DKI Andri Yansyah mengatakan bahwa DKI memberikan sejumlah potongan subisidi bagi pekerja.Pertama, dari transportasi DKI memberikan angkutan gratis asal memiliki kartu pekerja."Terkait transportasi kan gratis. Kita hitung biaya transportasi itu bisa menghabiskan 10-15 persen dari pendapatan," kata Andri di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Jumat (1/11).Kemudian, DKI juga mensubsidi banyak pangan kebutuhan sembako pekerja. Beberapanya di antaranya adalah daging sapi senilai Rp35 ribu per kilogram, beras Rp30 ribu per lima kilogram, daging ayam Rp8000 per kilogram dan telur Rp10 ribu per papan."Ada juga ikan kembung Rp13 ribu per kilogram dan susu UHT Rp30 ribu per karton," ungkap Andri.Selain makanan, DKI juga melakukan subsidi kepada pendidikan anak pekerja. Mereka akan diberikan dana bantuan Rp250 ribu per bulan untuk SD, Rp300 ribu SMP, Rp420 ribu untuk SMA dan SMK Rp450 ribu."Jadi bersih perbulan bisa hampir sekitar Rp800-900 ribu perbulan kita subsidi," tegas Andri.Diketahui, UMP DKI tahun 2020 sebesar Rp4.267.349,906. Jumlah UMP tahun 2020 mengalami kenaikan sebesar 8,51 persen dari UMP tahun ini dan sesuai dengan aturan Peraturan Pemerintah Nomor 78 Tahun 2015 tentang Pengupahan.Sebelumnya, Ketua Konfederasi Serikat Pekerja Indonesia (KSPI) wilayah DKI Jakarta Winarso menyatakan butuh mengusulkan angka Rp4,6 juta. Angka ini diajukan karena junlah kebutuhan menurut perhitungan KSPI adalah Rp5,5 juta per bulan. (ctr/evn)

UMP Rp. 4.2 Million, DKI Food Subsidies to Transportation
02 Nov 2019, 10:13 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan has knocked the 2020 aluminum wage income (UMP) to Rp4.2 million. In addition, Head of DKI Manpower Department Andri Yansyah said that DKI provides a number of subsidized deductions for workers. First, from transportation DKI provides free transportation as long as it has a worker's card. "Regarding transportation it's free. We calculate that transportation costs can spend 10-15 percent from income, "Andri said at the City Hall of DKI Jakarta, Friday (1/11). Then, DKI also subsidizes a lot of food needs for workers' needs. Some of them are beef worth IDR 35 thousand per kilogram, rice IDR 30 thousand per five kilograms, chicken meat IDR 8,000 per kilogram and eggs IDR 10,000 per board. "There are also mackerel fish IDR 13 thousand per kilogram and UHT milk IDR 30 thousand per carton," said Andri. Besides food, DKI also provides subsidies to the education of workers' children. They will be given a grant of Rp. 250 thousand per month for elementary school, Rp. 300 thousand for junior high school, Rp. 420 thousand for high school and vocational school. Rp. 450 thousand. "So, clean monthly can be around Rp. 800-900 thousand per month, we subsidize," said Andri. amounting to Rp4,267,349,906. The number of UMPs in 2020 increased by 8.51 percent from this year's UMP and in accordance with the Government Regulation Number 78 of 2015 concerning Wages. . This figure was proposed because the number of needs according to KSPI calculations was Rp.5.5 million per month. (ctr / evn)
